CustomField.description: It shows the time period from "Initial date" to "Final date" in which the Challenge is valid. If there is no "Final date" established but an "Initial date" is chosen, it only shows the "Initial date". If there is no "Initial date" established but a "final date" is chosen, it shows the time period from the creation date to "Final date".
CustomField.formula: IF( !ISNULL(FieloPLT__StartDate__c) && FieloPLT__StartDate__c = FieloPLT__EndDate__c, TEXT(Day(FieloPLT__StartDate__c)) + ' ' + CASE( MONTH(FieloPLT__StartDate__c), 1, 'Jan', 2, 'Feb', 3, 'Mar', 4, 'Apr', 5, 'May', 6, 'Jun', 7, 'Jul', 8, 'Aug', 9, 'Sep', 10, 'Oct', 11, 'Nov', 12, 'Dec', '') + ' ' + TEXT(YEAR(FieloPLT__StartDate__c) ) , IF( Year(FieloPLT__StartDate__c) = Year(FieloPLT__EndDate__c) , IF( Month(FieloPLT__StartDate__c) = Month(FieloPLT__EndDate__c) , TEXT(Day(FieloPLT__StartDate__c)) + ' - ' + TEXT(Day(FieloPLT__EndDate__c)) + ' ' + CASE( MONTH(FieloPLT__StartDate__c), 1, 'Jan', 2, 'Feb', 3, 'Mar', 4, 'Apr', 5, 'May', 6, 'Jun', 7, 'Jul', 8, 'Aug', 9, 'Sep', 10, 'Oct', 11, 'Nov', 12, 'Dec', '') + ' ' + TEXT(YEAR(FieloPLT__StartDate__c) ) , TEXT(Day(FieloPLT__StartDate__c)) + ' ' + CASE( MONTH(FieloPLT__StartDate__c), 1, 'Jan', 2, 'Feb', 3, 'Mar', 4, 'Apr', 5, 'May', 6, 'Jun', 7, 'Jul', 8, 'Aug', 9, 'Sep', 10, 'Oct', 11, 'Nov', 12, 'Dec', '') + ' - ' + TEXT(Day(FieloPLT__EndDate__c)) + ' ' + CASE( MONTH(FieloPLT__EndDate__c), 1, 'Jan', 2, 'Feb', 3, 'Mar', 4, 'Apr', 5, 'May', 6, 'Jun', 7, 'Jul', 8, 'Aug', 9, 'Sep', 10, 'Oct', 11, 'Nov', 12, 'Dec', '') + ' ' + TEXT(YEAR(FieloPLT__StartDate__c) ) ) , IF( ISNULL(FieloPLT__StartDate__c), '', TEXT(Day(FieloPLT__StartDate__c)) + ' ' + CASE( MONTH(FieloPLT__StartDate__c), 1, 'Jan', 2, 'Feb', 3, 'Mar', 4, 'Apr', 5, 'May', 6, 'Jun', 7, 'Jul', 8, 'Aug', 9, 'Sep', 10, 'Oct', 11, 'Nov', 12, 'Dec', '') + ' ' + TEXT(YEAR(FieloPLT__StartDate__c) ) ) + ' - ' + IF( ISNULL(FieloPLT__EndDate__c), '', TEXT(Day(FieloPLT__EndDate__c)) + ' ' + CASE( MONTH(FieloPLT__EndDate__c), 1, 'Jan', 2, 'Feb', 3, 'Mar', 4, 'Apr', 5, 'May', 6, 'Jun', 7, 'Jul', 8, 'Aug', 9, 'Sep', 10, 'Oct', 11, 'Nov', 12, 'Dec', '') + ' ' + TEXT(YEAR(FieloPLT__EndDate__c) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Time period in which the Challenge is valid.
CustomField.label: Period
